summary: Let your Dragonborn go to jail... in style.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]A tiny, somewhat silly mod I made for myself and decided to share.[/size]

[size=2]My Dragonborn is a kleptomaniac, but she's not very good at stealth. Her heavy armor and clunky greatsword don't really help with that. All her connections and friends in high places could only get her out of trouble a limited number of times, so now she's a regular in Whiterun's dungeon. In my humble opinion the mighty Dragonborn certainly deserves better than a dark, smelly, filthy cell... shared with a corpse, at that. [/size]

[size=4]This mod completely overhauls the player-assigned prison cell in Dragonsreach dungeon, and turns it into a comfortable, warm and bright room. Since an average player spends whole 30 seconds in the prison, just enough to click on the bed and let the time pass, there aren't any extra features included. The point was to make the place look worthy of an accomplished, world-famous Dragonborn. Nothing more.[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/SXFnH1H.jpg[/img]

[size=4]Quite obviously, the refurbished cell is not very immersive or realistic, probably not too lore friendly, either, but... it's fun and it's easy on the eyes, too. Plus, it gives your Dragonborn plenty to read while imprisoned. [/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/0w7wsFW.jpg[/img]

[size=4]For technicalities: all markers within the cell are left intact, of course. There are no scripts attached. The blood spatter from the floor has been removed, and the bandit's corpse has been dropped into the corridor below. All added containers are marked as belonging to player, the bed will also give a well rested bonus if you decide to have your character drop by and have a nap there as a free person. Basic Skyrim is the only requirement, and the mod has been cleaned in TES5Edit. [/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/F7IwJOX.jpg[/img]

Mods in the screenshots: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57350/?]e enb[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29608/?]detailed rugs and pelts[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7059/?]sexy whiterun[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]SMIM[/url].[/center]
author: Calarand
